wiki.summary: "Guns And Horses" was the third single from Ellie Goulding's debut album Lights. It was released on 17th May 2010. The song is the first track on Lights. Goulding told Sky Songs about this tune. "I wrote Guns And Horses about a romance that began online. I wanted the guy to feel more than he did for me but through no fault of his own he couldn't. It's a song about frustration essentially. My producer made me laugh at the end, I can't repeat what he called me though."
